title: JavaScript Junkie
content: This client-side scripting language allows users to create dynamic content for web applications. This was one of my first programming languages.

title: HTML Hell
content: Today is my very first day using HTML. I cannot seem to figure it out! Can someone help me find free resources for getting started in HTML?

title: JAVA JAVA JAVA
content: According to wikipedia, Java is a high-level, class-based, object-oriented programming language that is designed to have as few implementation dependencies as possible.
